args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Wheel Lock Up from Incorrectly Routed Brake Lines

McLaren Automotive Incorporated (McClaren) is recalling certain 2020-2025 600LT, 720S, Artura, GT, and GTS vehicles.  The brake lines may be routed incorrectly and cause the brakes on the incorrect side to activate, possibly resulting in one of the rear wheels locking up.A rear wheel locking condition may cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 29.0
